document.full_text: uncle mo, the two-year-old champion who was scratched the day before the kentucky derby, has been diagnosed with a liver disease called cholangiohepatitis.
document.title: the rail: liver disease keeps uncle mo sidelined
lines_and_colors: uncle mo, the two-year-old champion who was scratched the day before the kentucky derby, has been diagnosed with a liver disease called cholangiohepatitis.
